description: Redgreen envisage to be one of the top 3 technology brand in Bangladesh in 2023 by providing cutting edge and compelling design smartphone to the low/middle income people in Bangladesh. In Redgreen, we do develop, source and deliver smartphone and premium accessories based in Bangladesh. Our goal is bringing smartphone with cutting edge technology and compelling design at a lower cost. We are building something like Xiaomi from Bangladesh. Eliminate retail channel by ecommerce offerings, cutting marketing budget by social media and internet campaign and develop feedback based smartphone is the vision of Redgreen.
